hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Can you move me? I don't get great service here.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Forest Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found in #the Market#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Time#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Map#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# a melody and boulders conceal...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Skull Mask#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the Development branch may be unstable.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Hidden Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #an Odd Mushroom# can be found in #the Market#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #6# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Skull Mask#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to the #Fire Medallion#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #1# major item.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Map# and #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: This is a haiku&Five syllables then seven&Five more to finish
